Name: Chinese Cosmopolitan
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Oriental in name and style - perhaps a tad sweeter than your standard Cosmo.
History: Discovered in 2003 at Raoul's Bar, Oxford, England. For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Nutrition: One serving of Chinese Cosmopolitan contains 172 calories
